meta.name: nsq
meta.description: Dashboard for the telegraf input plug-in: NSQ
meta.author: influxdata

queries.query: SELECT mean("client_count") AS "client_count" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."nsq_channel" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host"=:host: GROUP BY time(:interval:)
SELECT mean("message_count") AS "message_count" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."nsq_channel" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host"=:host: GROUP BY time(:interval:)
SELECT mean("topic_count") AS "topic_count" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."nsq_server" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host"=:host: GROUP BY time(:interval:)
SELECT mean("server_count") AS "server_count" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."nsq_server" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host"=:host: GROUP BY time(:interval:)
SELECT mean("depth") AS "depth" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."nsq_topic" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host"=:host: GROUP BY time(:interval:)
SELECT mean("backend_depth") AS "backend_depth" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."nsq_topic" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host"=:host: GROUP BY time(:interval:)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("message_count")) AS "messages_per_second" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."nsq_topic" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host"=:host: GROUP BY time(:interval:)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("message_count")) - non_negative_derivative(max("depth")) AS "messages_per_second" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."nsq_topic" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host"=:host: GROUP BY time(:interval:)
